Bug Reports.title: App Functionality Issues
Bug Reports.description:
Issue: App not functioning properly, keyboard not appearing for money transfer, transaction failed but money debited, unclear error message for adding credit card for tap and pay.

Summary: Users are facing issues with the app, such as non-functioning features and unclear error messages. Transactions are failing and money is being debited without proper notification. The keyboard is not appearing for money transfer. Users have tried clearing data and cache, but the issue persists. A clear error message is needed for adding credit cards for tap and pay.
tags: Transaction failed due to network issue
Money debited but no message received
Money not credited after raising a ticket

Issues related to Transaction failure.title: Network errors and transaction issues
Issues related to Transaction failure.description: "Users are facing issues while performing transactions due to network errors. Money is being debited from bank accounts without proper notification. The app support team is asking for bank statements to resolve the issue, which is not user-friendly. Another issue is the 'Something went wrong' error while adding Visa credit cards for tap and pay. The app fails to provide a clear error message, even after trying various solutions like updating, clearing data and cache. This experience is highly unsatisfactory and needs to be fixed immediately."
tags: Transaction failed due to network issue
Money debited but no message received
Money not credited after raising a ticket
